topic.title: ZeroNet on Raspberry
topic.body: Hi everyone, I've recently been on ZeroNet and I'm using it on my Raspberry. In your opinion, I should always leave the raspberry on so I constantly peer or not?

11_1By85xCDz7VyZEq9WjmhtbNaPKimQwhPLp.body:
> [frayoshi](#comment_16_1By85xCDz7VyZEq9WjmhtbNaPKimQwhPLp): E' il blog Reb0rn!!sto aggiungendo la scritta morrolinux così spicca all'occhio che è il suo =)

Ciao, sono un nuovo utente di ZeroNet, purtroppo Morrolinux ha abbandonato Zeronet infatti non scrive più dal 2016.

1601625369_1GxcXMQvC2wXWVLVFeC4EyJiphuCh.body: In my opinion a phone must be resistant and powerful enough, to use the apps we use every day (Whatsapp, Telegram, Gmail etc ...). And manufacturers shouldn't create an update to slow down a phone.

1601128933_1AkCd6161a4erMEbe4998aX7Hnpd2.body: To modify the site, just go to the folder where ZeroNet is and enter data and search for the key of your site.

1591867834_1Q6CZ4X9qor4b8GCjYe372JRLBYYS.body: It depends on which site you have to do
